name: Stream Unavailable
description:
YouTube just added a new policy to its guidelines... no more copypasta.

And so when Ludwig leaves stream, Coots takes her chance for revenge...

This is a typing game, it is also my first game literally ever. Please don't expect much. Still kinda cool tho. 

INCLUDES ENGLISH AND SPANISH!!!!

Switch to Spanish in the 'options' menu on the title screen.

Development and Artwork done by ME

https://twitter.com/giantbigboom

Game Ideas and SFX by:

https://twitter.com/Blocko_boi

https://twitter.com/suboju

And Translation by:

https://twitter.com/Blocko_boi
